title: Failure to maintain the electrical installations and periodical certification may leads to disconnection of power supply by Power Supply Company till its rectification
clause_text: Failure to maintain the electrical installations and periodical certification may leads to disconnection of power supply by Power Supply Company till its rectification. (1)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
